title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama (generate, chat, pull, delete models).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/completion endpoints inside workflows.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python repo showing RAG with Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-chat-gradio
summary: Gradio chat template that proxies to Ollama; deployable on Hugging Face Spaces.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in threads; slash-command driven.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for direct messages and channel mentions.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to MCP clients (Claude Desktop, etc.).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with async/tokio support and strong typing.
